title: Full Show (Cowboys beat Bears, More Kyrie controversy, Do Aaron Rodgers and Davante Adams miss each other?)
description:
00:00 Cowboys beat Bears 49-29. Tony Pollard scores 3 times with Zeke out
28:07 Kyrie defends latest controversial posts
54:22 Michigan State suspends four players following postgame altercation with Michigan player
1:06:12 Aaron Rodgers and Davante Adams both struggled in Week 8 losses. Do they miss each other?
1:18:27 Jerry Jones weighs in on Zeke vs Pollard in the Cowboys starting RB battle
1:32:26 Cooper Kupp says he's feeling "pretty good" after ankle injury
1:41:45 How will Kyrie's behavior impact KD and the Nets?
1:49:28 Christian McCaffrey is the first player to score a rushing, receiving and passing TD in the same game since 05
1:53:45 Does Panthers loss fall on DJ Moore after late game penalty for removing helmet?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
